channel.title: Disconections when I move items around

item.title: Disconections when I move items around
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[code]case 214:
// change item places
somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); // junk
inStream.readSignedByteC();
int itemFrom = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); // slot1
int itemTo = inStream.readUnsignedWord();// slot2

		// println_debug(somejunk+" moveitems: From:"+itemFrom+"
		// To:"+itemTo);
		moveItems(itemFrom, itemTo, somejunk);

		break;

[/code]

When I move items around in the inv, It disconnects me and prints;

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Admin. [Admin] Disconnected

Can you guys see anything in that code that would cause it to disconnect me?

Read full topic
item.source: Disconections when I move items around
